SELECT q.qna_id AS qnaId, q.student_no AS studentNo, q.title, s.name AS studentName, q.content, q.is_secret AS isSecret, q.create_date AS createDate, q.update_date AS updateDate FROM qna q JOIN student s ON q.student_no = s.student_no WHERE ( ((title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND #{searchOption} = 'all') OR (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND #{searchOption} = 'title') OR (s.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND #{searchOption} = 'studentNo')
) ORDER BY q.create_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (title, content, student_no, create_date, is_secret) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{studentNo}, NOW() + INTERVAL 9 HOUR, #{isSecret})
